content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 units of iron ore in addition to the 10 units of coal I previously collected. 
# This gives me a good starting point to begin crafting basic items.

# Next, I will want to create a furnace to smelt the iron ore into iron plates. 
# To do this, I need to check if I have the necessary resources to craft a furnace.

# Let's inspect the inventory again to see what I have.
current_inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Current Inventory: {current_inventory}")

# Assuming I have enough resources, I will proceed to craft a furnace.
if current_inventory.get('coal', 0) >= 2 and current_inventory.get('iron-ore', 0) >= 3:
    craft_item('stone-furnace', quantity=1)  # Craft one stone furnace
    print(f"Crafted a stone furnace. Inventory now: {inspect_inventory()}")
else:
    print("Not enough resources to craft a stone furnace.")
